sentences.sContent: Use a minimum of ordinate and abscissa values so they do not run together.
sentences.sContent_eng: Use a minimum of ordinate and abscissa values so they do not run together.
sentences.sCn: 使用最低限度的协调与横坐标值使他们不跑在一起。

sentences.sContent: Phosphorus content in accordance with the abscissa, the ordinate physiological parameters for growth curve for result analysis.
sentences.sContent_eng: Phosphorus content in accordance with the abscissa, the ordinate physiological parameters for growth curve for result analysis.
sentences.sCn: 按照以磷含量为横坐标，各项生理参数为纵坐标绘制生长曲线，进行结果分析。

sentences.sContent: Position in the development of display images, but also can change the location to display the location, can customize the abscissa and ordinate values.
sentences.sContent_eng: Position in the development of display images, but also can change the location to display the location, can customize the abscissa and ordinate values.
sentences.sCn: 在制定的位置显示图像，还可以改变位置来显示位置，可以自定义横坐标和纵坐标的值。

trans.tranOther: the horizontal or x-coordinate of a point in a two-dimensional system of Cartesian coordinates
